A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I really don't see how the critics loved this so much. It had entire sub plots that were irrelevant\, a moment with Leia that didn't make ANY sense and totally took me out of the movie\, and I'm not really liking who the main villain will be moving forward. I don't mind the Luke story line as much as other and I liked the development of Poe\, but I just don't think it's a good movie.
